ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Female Slaves
ygData.msgSnippet: There is no female slave in a blue dress. Apparently it is any female high elf. She gives you a letter to take to Niola in the mage guild in Felwithe. The
ygData.messageBody:
There is no female slave in a blue dress.
Apparently it is any female high elf. She gives you a letter to take to
Niola in the mage guild in Felwithe.
The details of the quest are at
http://everquest.allakhazam.com/db/quest.html?quest=812
The dress also drops off of creatures in befallen and unrest. But it doesn't
really look worth it. You can look up stuff that might be better than it and
easy to obtain.
luv,
-Su

>
> hi,
>
> I have Spent the last 4 days hunting in cb for a female elf slave in blue
dress to hand the task master earing to, but all i ever see are wood elf
type slaves, non in blue dress. Are the slaves in blue dress for real?, i
have searched every single spawn point for the slaves, even had them all
killed, and freed a whole bunch but no high elf slave ever spawns . is there
any other way to get the gossamer robe? I tried to buy it but no-one ever
seems to sell or advertise it for sale.
>
> -------------------
> Nuada
> High Elf Mage -KIA-
> Druzzil Ro.
>
